# Yamanashi Queenbees

The Yamanashi Queenbees (; formerly the Kofu Queenbees, ) are a professional basketball team based in Kai, Yamanashi, playing in the Women's Japan Basketball League. From 2024 season they are playing in the lower “W-League Future", after the women’s league is split into two divisions.
Notable players
*Monami Nakajima
Venues
*Kofu General Civic Center
*Fuji Hokuroku Park
References
External links
*[http://www.yamanashi-queenbees.com/  Official website]
